standard_metadata.standard_description: Multiply a whole number of up to four digits by a one-digit whole number, and multiply two two-digit numbers, using strategies based on place value and the properties of operations. Illustrate and explain the calculation by using equations, rectangular arrays, and/or area models.

images.alt: A stacked multiplication problem. The equation shows 22 times 2.
A stacked multiplication problem. The equation shows 22 times 2. So, 2 times 2 ones is 4 ones. Next to the stacked equation is 2 times 2 equals 4.
A stacked multiplication problem. The equation shows 22 times 2. So, 2 times 2 tens is 4 tens. Next to the stacked equation is 2 times 2 equals 4, and 20 times 2 equals 40.
